text: Motomachi-Chūkagai Station (元町・中華街駅,もとまち・ちゅうかがいえき) is a railway station of Yokohama Minatomirai Railway Company in Nishi-ku, Yokohama, Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan. ==Adjacent stations== ;Yokohama Minatomirai Railway Company : Minatomirai Line ::Limited Exp. :::Minatomirai - Motomachi-Chūkagai ::Commuter Exp., Expless, Local :::Nihon-ōdōri - Motomachi-Chūkagai Category:Railway stations in Kanagawa Prefecture Category:Yokohama
title: Motomachi-Chūkagai Station
